title: Concurrent Types
desc: CaMPL has typed communication along channels: these concurrent types are called protocols.

title: Deadlocks and Livelocks
desc: Pure CaMPL is deadlock and livelock free and guaranties progress.

title: Controled Non-Determinism
desc: CaMPL has races which allow non-deterministic concurrent behaviour.

title: Sequential Data
desc: CaMPL has data and codata declarations.
